name: La Milano Nascosta
description:
A work of:

 Yue Zhao, Ciro De Palma, Meng Yao, Cheng Zhang

The aim of our project is to give a vr experience to hidden and unexplored places in the city. To allow the user to know and experience the history and culture of the city.
These hidden places tell unique stories, they are located in places trafficked by tourists and workers but you don't know the past or how they have transformed over time.
Each of the places we have chosen has some connection with Italian history, they represent a small part of Italy in miniature and tell the story of Italian culture, such as gastronomy, religion, literature.
